admreg: East Asia and Pacific,East Asia and Pacific

abstracts.cdata!:
The project would help finance: (a)
            loans, over a three-year period to approximately 12,000
            farmers engaged in the cultivation of fruit orchards,
            sericulture, mushroom production and the breeding of poultry
            and swine; (b) the foreign exchange costs of an
            organizational and accounting study of NACF; and (c) the
            strengthening of NACF's training facilities.
